name: zenith-focus-timer
description: A minimalist timer app to help you focus, breathe, and relax. Features customizable durations and optional chime sounds for a serene experience.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --jsx=automatic --format=esm --platform=browser --external:react --external:react-dom/client --external:react/jsx-runtime && cp index.html manifest.json metadata.json dist/
